lines.text: The red zone is for communist parking only!
Not exactly a four star hotel, is it?
Well, we spend our police budget on fighting criminals, not on pampering out of town visitors.
It was your government that brought us here!
They also bring in monkeys for zoo, but we don't put them in four star hotel either!
Everything about me... is real
Again. When you hear door, you say
[puts money on table]
"I'm in the bathroom, I'll meet you there."
I'm in the bathroom. Meet me there.

[sighs, puts more money on table]
Again!
[singing]
I'm in the bathrooom, I'll meet you theeere.

[singing]
I'm in the bathrooom, meet you theeere.
[grumbling in frustration, knocks desk with his fist twice]
Come in.
Katrina, how can I help you?
You ever want something so badly it hurts?
Yes.
No matter how much you wait and hope and wait more, you don't get what you want?
Well, yeah. But my advice is don't give up. Just go for it.
I want...
Attagirl. Follow your heart.
I want...
Say it.
I want my vacation.
What's that?
I wait three years. Three years! Then you Americans come. Talinsky, he assign me to you.
Mmm-hmm.
Now I can't go. I have plan. Connors. I don't leave you.
[Connors smiles]
Without anyone.
[Connors' smile disappears]
Come.
[Katrina takes him to a window, where a rather large, unattractive female officer is seen licking an envelope, smiling and waving at Connors, while rubbing the envelope on her chest]
I select suitable replacement for you. She is best in department.

[nervous laugh]
Yeah, I'm sure she is.

[the team meet with Russian forensics expert Irina Petrovskaya]
Cadet Connors is also a forensics expert.
Maybe you'd be so generous to share with us your expertise.
Sure.
[he sits down at desk. Irina puts a slide under the microscope]
This one puzzles us. We were able to remove only one fingerprint from scene of crime. This is our only clue to identity of criminal.
Okey-dokey.
[Adjusts microscope lens closer to slide, until it makes contact, cracking the slide in half. Irina shrieks in horror. Jones & Callahan cringe]
No wonder you're puzzled. This glass is all cracked!
ENOUGH!
[exits]
Next assignment, Chernobyl.

[Accompanied by his host family, Lassard exits train while holding balloons as they all laugh]
Great, great subway. Terrific! I mean, New York is a shithouse, but this is great.

[Bellboy is eating in Lassard's hotel room, plates of food strewn everywhere. Jones & Tackleberry are outside. They see a messy room service tray. Jones knocks on door]
Sir? I want to remind you the plane leaves at 3 o'clock!

[With a mouthful of water]
In a bathroom.
Sir?
[Bellboy lets out a huge belch. Jones looks worried, sees 'Do Not Disturb' sign on door]

[to Tackleberry]
Something about that sign disturbs...

[on toilet, burping, crying]
Mama.

[to Tackleberry]
What do you say we, uh...
I'm way ahead of ya.
[Tackleberry takes wine bottle holder from cart, puts it on his head and charges, breaking a hole in the door]
Sir?

[Bellboy is seen showering fully clothed, freezing in the cold water]
In the t-t-t-t-t-t bathrooooom...
[Tackleberry puts the wine bottle holder down, puts his cap back on. Jones & Tackleberry silently leave]
